description: Sin descripción

name: Pinochle Pro
description: Sin descripción

name: 3D Magic Chess HD
description: Sin descripción

name: Cover Orange
description: Make your day orange!

name: Atomic Heist
description: Grab the atomic core and fight your way out of the overrun space station. Manage your ammo carefully. Use collected power ups wisely. The core is leaking radiation so move quickly. Along the way unlock permanent items and find secrets to ease the escape and pull off the Atomic Heist.

name: Darco: Reign of Elements
description: Darco takes place in a post-apocalyptic Steampunk setting, in which you’re fighting for survival against mechanical creatures. It is a multiplayer game located on huge ships floating over an endless ocean. You’re not alone though, as you’re also raising a dragon as your companion!

name: Damascus Gear: Operation Osaka - HD Edition
description:
Mecha Hack'n'Slash "Damascus Gear: Operation Osaka HD Edition",
is now out on Steam with full HD graphics!
Pilot your humanoid mecha "GEAR", alongside with your dependable operator!
Will you be able to pay off your debts before the due date?

name: Pop-Up Pilgrims
description: Floating Cloud God and his devoted pilgrims have a big adventure ahead! Put on your PlaystationVR headset and discover a world of pop-up islands, colorful characters, and deadly demons, all uniquely presented as 2D graphics in a wrap-around 3D space. More than 50 stages curve around the player as they try to lead the pilgrims from platform to platform – left, right, in or out – to take on a cast of lively enemies and find a safe route to the exit.

name: Stellaris: Apocalypse
description: Stellaris: Apocalypse redefines stellar warfare for all players with a host of new offensive and defensive options. Destroy entire worlds with terrifying new planet-killer weapons, fight against (or alongside) ruthless space pirates, and maybe discover a few non-violent game features as well.

name: Cat Knights
description: Cat Knights is 2D side scroller-clicker game with rpg elements for Android and PC. In this game you take a role of a cat knight and fight your way through hordes of enemies while collecting trophies and unlocking new playable characters.

name: Enchanting Mahjong Match
description: Enchanting Mahjong Match is one of the connecting game classics. The main goal of this game is to connect the identical tiles with lines and remove them from the board. In Enchanting Mahjong Match, The line can change direction only twice. Or less, of course. Also known as Mahjong Solitaire, Shisen-sho, Onet, Lianliankan. 28 beauties in the game have the name of an ancient Chinese constellation. Earn 3-stars rating, win Celestial Beauties artworks! Enchanting Mahjong Match will be your perfect companion, whether it's hours or less than a few minutes! FEATURES: • Challenge yourself to 140 levels • Easy to play, gets challenging as you level up • Use special item to break through difficulties • 28 beauties has its own fantastical artwork to delight you • Replay each level as many times as you like

name: Heir of Light
description: Sin descripción

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2
description: The Division 2 is an action-shooter RPG set in an open-world. Play in co-op and PvP modes that offer more variety in missions and challenges, new progression systems with unique twists and surprises, and fresh gaming innovations to engage players for years to come.

name: Boink Zoink Hoink
description:
Match them All! Place fun pieces on the board to match similar ones and build new pieces or destroy others. 
 
Think strategically where you place your pieces to make your matches at the right spot, and get higher-order pieces. 
 
Search for special items to help you beat harder levels. 
 
Challenge your mind to complete carefully crafted puzzles. 
 
Relax in a playful atmosphere that will make you feel at ease. 
 
Experience various gameplays of Match-2, Match-3 or Match-4, and other twists. 
 
Enjoy a diversity of playable sets by different artists, from cute little fuzzy animals to cartoon monsters, fashionable hats, yummy sweets, scrumptious cakes, legendary fantastic beasts, dragons and much more to come...

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate
description: Legendary game worlds and fighters collide in the ultimate showdown—a new entry in the Super Smash Bros. series for the Nintendo Switch system! New fighters, like Inkling from the Splatoon series and Ridley from the Metroid series, make their Super Smash Bros. series debut alongside every Super Smash Bros. fighter in the series…EVER! Faster combat, new items, new attacks, new defensive options, and more will keep the battle raging whether you’re at home or on the go.

name: Demolish & Build 2018
description:
Your company is going global. Use big machines to demolish huge buildings or go close and personal and use your hammer. 
 
Buy land properties, upgrade your machines and hire workers in different parts of the world. 
 
- Various construction and demolition machines 
- 4 different world locations with freely navigable world 
- Hire and manage workers 
- 2 players cooperative multiplayer 
- Specialized hand tools 
- Demolition site dust control 
- Finish contracts or use your machines to gather resources and earn cash 
- Invest in your own properties 
- Demolition site preparation 
- Manage your company and make sure it's rating goes up

name: Around the Moon
description:
This game is a modded version of a Open Source game by Pig Dev Studio.
The project can be found here:
https://pigdev.itch.io/mooncheeser

name: Code of Princess EX
description: Journeying back to an acclaimed cult hit, Code of Princess EX is an updated remake of the classic Nintendo 3DS “hack-and-slash” action game that features role-playing game (RPG) elements. This all-new EX version introduces higher-resolution art, a local (two-player) co-op option for the entire Campaign Mode and numerous other gameplay additions and enhancements including improved AI, updated balancing, a new character leveling-up system and overall better playability.

name: Paranoia: The Official Video Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Torn
description: Torn is a dark science-fiction mystery. Explore the abandoned mansion of Dr. Lawrence Talbot, an eccentric physicist missing for 64 years. Use the Gravity Tool to activate Talbot's machines, then transport to a new dimension known as "The Parallel," where secrets are real, yet truth is Torn.

name: Layers of Fear 2
description: Layers of Fear 2 is a first-person psychological horror game with an emphasis on exploration and story. Players control a Hollywood actor who heeds the call of an enigmatic director to take on the lead role in a film shot aboard an ocean liner. Beware, for all may not truly be what it seems.

name: WarioWare Gold
description:
The infamous schemer, Wario, is back!

Play his brand-new microgame collection, where you'll have seconds to complete 300 different microgames. Better think fast to succeed! You'll use the touchscreen, tilt the system, push buttons, and rock the mic as you laugh through fully voiced stories featuring new and classic characters!

name: Luigi's Mansion
description:
G-g-ghosts!
All this ghost-catching tomfoolery pays off! As you suck 'em up with your Poltergust 3000, you could also rake in millions in hidden, in-game riches for our hard-luck hero. Make sure to search every area using the Game Boy Horror's map on your touchscreen and activate its Boo Radar to track down every Boo in the mansion or spot ghosts' weak points. After beating and capturing boss ghosts, you can select their portraits from the gallery to best your own score in tense rematches—a new feature in the Nintendo 3DS version!

name: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Lord of Tempest
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario & Luigi: Bowser's Inside Story + Bowser Jr.'s Journey
description: In addition to the game’s revamped graphics and refined gameplay, a new side story follows Bowser Jr. as he gathers an army, creates formations, supports his allies with an arsenal of moves and generally causes chaos (in the best way possible).

name: Pandora: Chains of Chaos
description: A 17-year-old girl named Pandora has opened the box that could destroy the world. Kome Village, her home, is invaded by creatures spawned from the darkness and the legendary Titans. During the invasion, Pandora obtains an unusual weapon, an Umbrella, which allows her to defeat the Titans.

name: Wheelz2
description: Drive the most advanced bike through stunning courses of all kinds.

name: Grood
description: Grood is about fighting. The gameplay blends classic Shoot 'em up frenetics mechanics with modern low poly graphics, particles, shaders, and the power of Unity. Annihilate an army of machines, and afterward, annihilate their bosses—go all the way to confirm that your battle paid off.

name: Patent9
description: A pulp noir visual novel. It’s immersed in hard-smacking dialogue with tragic antiheroes through a sordid storyline, featuring mystery, conspiracy, and murder all set in a neon-lit, rain-soaked, deco cityscape.

name: Patchman vs. Blue Squares
description: More Sheeple need rescuing - this time from Office World - and Patchman is on the case! But now there are sinister Blue Squares to contend with... and a boss EIGHT TIMES more powerful than the last one! Grow, sneak, and battle your way to the truth!

name: Achievement Lurker: Easiest Cosmetic Numbers
description:
Turn based combat. XP based leveling system. Boss fight. Talk to NPC
Turn based combat
XP level system
Boss fight
NPC

name: Witching Tower
description:
Witching Tower is the VR Action Adventure game set in dark fantasy world.

Adventure through each level of the Tower; having its own history and individual quirks. Brace yourself for a unparalleled experience enhanced with breathtaking visuals and environments.

name: Gohorobo
description: We move and lift a robot that can only move 5 steps, and light the electricity at the power outage

name: Orbos
description: Cute and chaotic fun! Play as one of 7 different character classes in a quick and deadly multiplayer PvP arena shooter where only the quick witted survive. Compete against your friends in classic team deathmatch or overcharge yourself and pummel the enemy base in our Orbomb game mode!

name: Spencer
description: Spencer is a classic Jump´n Run with challenging levels and enemies. Find missing items, destroy enemies, collect coins and diamonds. 3D graphics packed in a nice graphics style, great 2.5D levels and proven gameplay gives you hours of fun.

name: Survive in Angaria
description: Survive in Angaria is a mini RPG survival game...

name: Free At Last
description: Play as a robot that escapes from working at a rocket factory and explore your star system. Establish bases, research technology, farm, fish, fight, and so much more.

name: Super Skull Smash GO! 2 Turbo
description: The Kingdom of Bones needs you! Purify the land and stop Evil King once and for all. Take the skull-smashing puzzle platformer in a new direction with TURBO action, TURBO puzzles and TURBO boss battles.

name: Road Legends
description:
Road Legends is a neon retro-futuristic racing game where you will race to music and collect bonuses on a rhythm basis
You're on the road, although this time it's not a race where you need to be faster than your rivals! Just relax and drive through futuristic city!
Road Legends offers 13 challenging levels where you will put on test your reaction by collecting bonuses and avoiding obstacles.

name: Poly World
description: Poly World is a rhythm based game which combines amazing levels of different difficulty and carefully selected soundtracks.

name: Drakeling Labs
description: Official account for Drakeling Labs project prototypes. Download our free demo to play whatever our latest experiment happens to be.

name: Blue.
description: Blue. is the part puzzle game, part visual novel, story of a young cubie growing up in a colorful mined out world of gems. Play as Violet through their adolescence, meet their friends and family and learn about the Cubie world. And most of all learn when it takes to succeed in this underground place.

name: Angel Precario
description: The life of Aria Keiko was quiet and she never had to worry about anything, but one event in her life puts her immediately in a precarious situation, totally unknown to her.

name: Turtle Lu
description: Turtle Lu is an old-school Action-Adventure game, Explore immense 2D Zones.

name: Don't Stand Out
description: Multiplayer shooter, in which a backflip is a solution to all your problems. Destroy, burn and freeze your enemies to win in the battle royale or fail while trying to do so!

name: Outbreak: The Nightmare Chronicles
description: Experience an immersive and horrifying single-player survival horror nightmare. Trapped alone in a desolate manor and hunted by monstrous foes, you will need to scrounge for supplies, manage your resources, solve puzzles and battle the undead to survive.

name: Farming Simulator 17: Ropa Pack
description: Expand Farming Simulator 17 with the ROPA Pack, for the most complete Farming Simulator experience! Drive 6 new vehicles and equipment from ROPA, including the ROPA Tiger 6 sugar beet harvester and the ROPA Keiler 2 potato harvester.

name: The Captives: Plot of the Demiurge
description: The Captives: Plot of the Demiurge is an action-adventure game with real-time combat and a strong focus on story. Create and play as a collection of prisoners, who must work together to defeat the evil schemes of Prince Pico and his newly-acquired magical powers.

name: Spyhack
description: Become a hacker that works for an intelligence agency. Help agents in the field during their covert operations, hack and control any device you encounter. Tuxedos, underwater bases, banquets, advanced technologies and heavy weapons - we have all of that and much more!

name: Squarewave Maker
description: Squarewave Maker is a sandbox rhythm action game where the level is your musical instrument. Alone or with friends you'll have to be a virtuoso to be the best. Create and share levels and music to become one of our community's most regarded maestros. Music is always just one jump away.

name: Cars and Trucks: preschool toddler learning games, learn shapes & colors
description: Sin descripción

name: 57° North for Merge Cube
description: 57° North tells a gripping story with hundreds of decisions and multiple endings that depend on the choices you make. All you need is a compatible iOS or Android device. For an even more immersive experience, it can also work with the Merge Cube (https://mergevr.com/cube) to bring gorgeous illustrations to life in the palm of your hand. Just don’t get too distracted looking at the scenery… we’ve heard there are bears on the island.

name: Sanity: Aiken's Artifact
description: In the near future, Psionics are among us. Their evil thoughts pulsate across time and space corrupting even the strongest minds. Players assume the role of Agent Cain, a powerful Psionic working for an elite government agency. As Cain, you strive for mastery of innate psychic “Talents” such as the ability to shoot fireballs or the power to summon hideous creatures. Using these “Talents” depletes both Health and Sanity, so players must walk a fine line to ensure that they don't lose their minds!

name: Tardy
description: Tardy is a quest about fiddling with computers, terminals gadgets and other hi-tech scrap of all sorts. Deal with crazy machines, solve the mystery of the crew disappearance and help Ramto to come back home!

name: Fox Hime
description: Yan is a college student with a special girl at his side, and she is Yan's Guardian.「If my girlfriend is as beautiful as Mori, then my life must be blessed by gods....」When he is saying that, he has no clue that another girl is coming into his life....

name: Another Sight
description: Created with heart, culture and character, ANOTHER SIGHT is the story of Kit and Hodge. Whilst exploring the London Underground during its construction in 1899, Kit, a bold teenager is caught in a tunnel collapse. When Kit wakes up, her sight is gone, and she’s left helpless in the dark world below London. Hodge, a mysterious cat finds Kit, and becomes her companion on a journey through a surreal fantasy adventure, influenced by Neil Gaiman’s Neverwhere.

name: Mars Taken
description: Mars Taken is a TPP Shooter with aliens on Mars. Explore red planet and follow a deep story. This is not a story about aliens...it is a story about life and love.

name: Ready Player One: Rise of the Gunters
description: Ready Player One: Rise of the Gunters

name: Supipara: Chapter 2
description: After seven years, Yukinari Sanada has returned to his hometown in Kanagawa Prefecture, Kamakura City, but something feels... different. Both he and his younger sister, Rikka, transfer into Oumi Academy and hope for a fresh start. However, Yukinari's classmates, a lazy witch and a half-Japanese beauty, won't allow him enjoy his new life for very long.

name: Volkstein
description: Ouvbane, a vicious demonic trickster, has come back to life. And only Cauflin can stop him. Why? Because why not? He doesn't really want to. He'd rather stay home, but Ouvbane took his wife. And she brings home the bacon. And Cauflin really doesn't want to get a job.

name: Together VR
description: Come! Indulge yourselves in your own private den and create sweet and loving memories with her!

name: Battle of Keys
description: Low Poly FPS Shooter where you need find 5 keys and avoid police army

name: Galactic Delivery
description: A game with ambient relaxing synth and the simple task of delivering packages. Hired only as an intern for a 14-day trial, can you make it last?

name: Grim Facade: A Wealth of Betrayal - Collector's Edition
description: The city fears the return of the infamous Fire Knight – but is Rosa Ramirez really responsible?

name: Grimcastle: Battle Tales
description: A card game with RPG elements in a dark fantasy world, where demons and people live side by side. Balance between tactics and luck, moving from one fight to another with your character - assassin, paladin or demon.

name: Barbearian
description: Barbearian is a fast-paced hack'n'slash with massive battles in a colorful, hand-drawn world. Fight for your life, discover the secrets of the Arbitrators and find your way back home!

name: ATV Simulator VR
description: Engage in a virtual reality ATV driving experience in a free-range outdoor environment. Explore a forest with jumps and scenery. SteamVR and Oculus support included.

name: Roller Coaster Egypt VR
description:
Roller Coaster Egypt VR more than five minutes, with lots of excitement and speed.
Enjoy the ride between pyramids, mummies and even spiders!

Two rides included, day and night.
Enjoy the night ride and have fun!

name: Dead Climb
description:
Dead Climb is a casual ragdoll physics-based game about climbing
after death. The player is thrown into mountain climbing limbo and
has to use his dead limbs to reach the top. Zombietaining!

name: The Unintended Consequences of Curiosity
description: The Unintended Consequences of Curiosity is a casual adventure puzzle game. A couch co-op that is equally playable solo. It packs a heart warming story and a charming world for everyone to explore.

name: Skull Feast
description: Skull Feast - is a competitive third person hack-and-slash skill-based melee action game.

name: The Adventurous Four
description:
"The Adventurous Four" is a sequel to our "Wild Island Quest"
visual novel, which was published a few years ago. In this game-book
you'll have to go on a journey full of dangers and adventures. The
main characters are all good friends, ready to overcome difficulties
to save each other in this quest.

name: Ultimate Select Hero
description: Sin descripción

name: High Speed Trains
description: Get ready for the worldwide railway voyage on modern trains. Try your hand at train driving, explore various railway lines and transport passengers through stations.

name: Travildorn
description:
The streets are covered with darkness, through the flashlight you notice a whole horde of zombies! 
You have to shoot, run, survive...

name: Guards of the Gate
description: Guards of the Gate is a rogue-like RPG game with turn based battles on hexagonal fields. You control a team of heroes aka Guards of the Gate, who are trying to save the world from the evil Dragon Lord.

name: Cardinal Cross
description:
Cardinal Cross is a sci-fi cyberpunk themed otome visual novel game. The game features 80+ backgrounds, 50+ side characters, and 70+ CGs. Lana has 3 different personality choices, as well as 2 male and 1 female romance options, with multiple endings.

Will Lana emerge as hero or villain?

name: The Four Colour Theorem
description: The Four Colour Theorem is a game of competitive colouring in. Challenge yourself to colour in the pictures so that none of the colours touch. Then when you can do this try for the top score!

name: Pheer
description: This is a platforming-puzzle game telling the story of a boy and his faithful puppy, where they find themselves in a beautiful and unusual world.

name: Hotel Spring
description: A first-person puzzle mystery game with 3D controls and a focus on atmosphere and immersion

name: Battle of Cubes
description: Battle of Cubes is a 2.5D shoot 'em up game in which a huge battle between cubes takes place. Fight with your units to the enemy lines to get the victory! Conquer nodes to expand your territory and get a huge army!

name: Bitcoin
description: Become the new king of cryptocurrency! Bitcoin is a clicker-type game where you aim to mine as many Bitcoins!

name: Landwars
description: Play as an Anti Terrorist/Terrorist and fight in a scenario full of twists where all means are good for victory. Developed by LandStudio.

name: SShield Reborn
description: This Guitar Hero/Tap Tap Revenge] like game extends your music enjoyment to another sense: touch by challenging users to show their skill and music perception. now we are available on Steam.

name: Russian Prisoner VS Nazi Zombies
description: You are prisoner Artyomich, and you need to kill all the devils of the SS from Hell in order to save Russia from the apocalypse.

name: Shrouded in Sanity: Freebirth
description:
Free version of Shrouded in Sanity. Discover the secrets of the estate, as you look for answers among the violent inhabitants.
Servants roaming the halls will attack on sight, for a strange and repelling madness took hold... one rooted in a deeper understanding of cosmic insignificance.

name: The Famous Diver
description: Your goal is to protect our main character from underwater bombs and predators while he swim to a certain point.

name: Trivia Vault: Boxing Trivia
description: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault Boxing Trivia and bring your thinking hat. Answer boxing trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value.

name: ShineG In Future Factory
description: Thank you for the ShineG support.This is a casual game.Shine attacks the enemy as we eliminate the square.The more the elimination of the box, Shine will get stronger fighting force.The game has a certain strategic.There are also ranking features.Environment set in the arms factory.Enemies are robots.

name: What's the Difference? Spot It
description:
The official worldwide smash hit Spot the Difference game! Newly remastered with hundreds of beautiful high definition photos!

Hunt your way around the world from Transylvania to Timbuktu and Sydney to San Francisco in an epic journey for steely-eyed smartphone sleuths!

name: Chess for Kids - Play & Learn
description: Sin descripción

name: Flappy Fire
description: Sin descripción

name: Candy Makeup Party Salon
description: Sin descripción

name: The Wranglers
description:
A desperate man asks on an online forum for help, rambling about an old "haunted" videogame 
he barely managed to get running. He needs someone to assist him as it appears that 
this game can only be played by two people. A downloadable file to connect you to his server 
is all he left you.

name: Fix Race
description: Top down racing game ! Fixed screen! +1000000000 procedural maps.

name: Seasonal Soccer
description: Seasonal Soccer is single-player soccer game and incredible fun to play. Play against challenging CPU! You can also let AI play your team players and "manager" your team. And take full control when situation goes tricky! Or play all time with 100% control of your players. You have 4 teams to choose: Spain, Switzerland, Finland and Honduras. Easy to play & fun!

name: Crazy Road
description: Crazy Road - runner made in the style of dynamic racing on the counter. Try to go as far as possible under a pleasant musical accompaniment.

name: Shapestorm
description: Navigate the storm of shapes to collect the glowing orbs!

name: Music Boy 3D
description: Music Boy 3D is a rhythm-based 3D runner game.

name: Alien Invasion 3d
description: In this game you have to be fast and precise . Enemy planes are on your tail all the time .

name: Tower climber
description:
Tower climber is a super simple, excitingly fun and surprisingly addictive game suitable for people of all ages. Simply tap to make the character jump, try to rise as high as you can and don't fall because it'll hurt :). Featuring cute pixel-art graphics, this endless arcade will keep the user entertained for hours!
HIGHLIGHTS:

name: Stunt Hill
description: Ride a car of the future along the routes with a mass of stunt tricks and jumps. Tachs are equipped with turbo acceleration for overcoming long distances. Keep high speed and reach the finish. In addition to the standard control from the keyboard, you can control the gamepad. The routes are divided into checkpoints. There are 3 cars available in the game.

name: Asteroid Deflector XL
description: Prevent asteroids from hitting a planet by changing their course with various projectiles against the gravity of a planet and a star. Manage your economics like money, weapon research and planet population.

name: Oakwood Academy of Spells and Sorcery
description: Oakwood Academy of Spells and Sorcery is a fun adult visual novel filled with romance and adventure. You play as Thomas Middleton, a first-year student, who tries to get by while encountering a diverse set of wacky and fascinating characters along the way!

name: Bunny Hop
description: A simple platformer about a rabbit, which needs to collect carrots in order to move to the next level.

name: Cale Quest
description: When he finds no food in the kitchen again, Cale is driven into a rage. He determines to not just make an ordinary snack, but the best sandwich ever made.

name: ACA Neo Geo: Real Bout Fatal Fury
description: Real Bout Fatal Fury is a fighting game released by SNK in 1995. Using the previous system as a base, isolating the Sweep Button, the inclusion of Combination Attacks, and other elements such as ring outs make for an even speedier and tempo-based play style. Sixteen fighters battle it out to see who is the strongest.

name: Junior Sudoku (Easy Fun Puzzles)
description: Sin descripción

name: AirFMC
description: Sin descripción

name: Lost In Night
description: Sin descripción

name: Brain Puzzle
description: Sin descripción

name: Mr. Runner 2: The Masks
description: Sin descripción

name: Quento
description: Quento is a little math puzzler without ads aimed for kids and adults. Quento gives you the solution to a sum and you'll have to do the math. To play, just swipe from a number to a + or - and to another number again. Stars are earned when the sum adds up to the challenge above and before you know it you've progressed a round!

name: Football General Manager
description: Sin descripción

name: Decoy
description: DECOY is fast paced top-view action game, in which you are the Decoy! Join the commander on a exciting journey of crazy missions, full of slippery roads, magnetic mines, fast bomb planes, tanks and EMP-dropping choppers!

name: BoxEngine
description: Control your little box with your own rhythm - it will be a different experience~

name: Stick War: Castle Defence
description: Paying homage to an era of stickmen and flash games, whilst diving into modern day, rpg inspired combat and progression. Hone a unique play style to combat hordes of unmotivated stickmen, as they attempt to storm your castle.

name: Swingy Sword
description: Swingy Sword is an exciting but casual 3D fighting game where you fight to the death against up to 4 of your friends in 6 unique game modes. The most difficult part of the game is the controls.

name: Sword Mans
description: Sword Mans is a physics based sword fighting brawler where you control the sword instead of the swordsman.

name: Russia Horror 20!8
description: In this game you are waiting for various frightening effects, screamers and scary sounds. If you think that I'm exaggerating her dignity, then try the game in person. And while I hide behind the sofa. I advise you to play in a dark room and at night. I'll see you in the Russia Horror 20!8.

name: Unholy
description: Open the doors between your everyday reality and a dark unholy world to unveil the mystery of the disappearance of your child. Explore both worlds to find clues, solve puzzles, decide whether you infiltrate or fight brutal enemies and stand up to an aberrant establishment.

name: Natural Landscape: Three Gorges
description: The Natural landscape series is a virtual tourism VR game based on unreal engine developed meticulously by Magicvalley Studio.

name: Easter Swap - Coloring Holiday
description: Sin descripción

name: Top Model Makeover - Girls Makeup & Dress Up Games
description: Sin descripción

name: Paleocalypse
description: An action RPG/adventure game with a geological plot about life evolution and genetic manipulations

name: Clown's Secret
description: A 2D point and click adventure game, based on classic movies of the silent age.

name: Life Beyond
description:
Life Beyond is an open world, video game experience with community at its core. This always-on alternate reality offers a place for everyone, regardless of your playstyle or time commitment. Step into a new century, where the people of earth have been granted access to a mysterious uncharted world. On Corvus, you will find a land filled with secrets, untold riches and opportunity for all, heralding the dawn of a new age for humankind and the birth of a bold new society.

Our ambition is for a new type of player community to flourish, where a vibrant economy and intuitive gameplay systems let you take control to shape the world and define your role in it.

name: Dakota Winchester's Adventures
description: Intrepid archaeologist, Dakota Winchester, is on a quest to find the three cursed rubies that will unlock Hilda’s box. His quest first takes him to a tropical island, where the team he has assigned to the task of locating the first ruby are proving less than stellar.

name: Guardians of Gold
description: When antique shop owners Allyson Tremonte and her friend Kyle start restoring an 18th century desk, they make a startling discovery. A secret compartment holds a letter that promises to show them the way to Paititi, the legendary lost city of gold.

name: Route 401 Motel
description: You’ve inherited a motel from your “Uncle Louis” Now you just need to evict the family of squatters that have moved in to claim your inheritance.

name: Bloody Mary's Mansion
description: After trying to summon Bloody Mary, she captured you. If you want to survive, then you must play her game for five nights, or else!

name: Morbius: The Utopia Conspiracy
description: The City of Frankfurt/M. is struck by a series of cruel murders. At the same time, Mike Morbius, private detective, gets assigned a new task about some suspicious project called "Utopia". Can Morbius find out what's going on? Is there any link to the murders? Only Mike Morbius can find out. Currently, this game is available in German language only. Please keep in mind that this game heavily relies on text and speech. Knowledge of German language is mandatory! Loosely based on the characters and setting of the books "Meister des Feuers" and "Downtown" written by Johann C. Lotter. Permission to release this game was granted by the book author.

name: Dick Ricko
description: Dick Rico takes on a different approach to a point and click adventure. It's up to you to solve the crime and determine the outcome. You are Detective Rico Stone! Investigate and lock up whoever you like for the crime.

name: Skumring
description: Port Horizon 1951. A city on the verge of collapse. Moral collapse. Crime. Corruption. Greed... Money. Private eye Cooper Chutney thought he was the exception. When a beautiful dame in distress enters his office he is ready to show that someone still cares about something in this wretched town. But as he soon will learn everything can change during a cold Port Horizon night... Skumringª features 30+ locations, 15+ characters and 40+ inventory items. It will also feature a varied soundtrack, consisting of traditional jazz and original interpretations of classical music.

name: Night Detective
description: Night Detective is an adventure point and click puzzle game! The game is centered around the mysterious man who only appears under the cover of darkness. This man is only known by the name of "Night Detective". Some people believe he is a criminal, others believe he is strange, and the rest do not know what to believe. For most, his existence is only a rumor. Click through levels by solving puzzles, exploring, and collecting new items to reach different areas! Become the Night Detective. See this new world through his magnifying glass. Are you ready for the adventure, detective?

name: Conspirocracy
description: A Canadian point-and-click adventure game about lost identity in a bureaucratic world loosely inspired by Douglas Adams’ Bureaucracy (1987).. A project for the Foundation Fighting Blindness.

name: Fight Crab
description:
Welcome to Crab Fight.
A new 3D action game where you take control of a crab, and fight off other giant enemy crabs.

In this far-off world,
These crabs were granted ultimate strength and intelligence from the generous gods. Using their newfound strength and wit, they armed themselves with human weapons of the finest calibur, and took control of the lands. Immortal beings of unrelenting horror, they cannot be killed with swords or even guns.

However, there is only one principle fact that rules these lands; “Those who are flipped onto their shells, shall be cooked into a crab cake, or mouth-watering rangoon.”

Yes,yes...Crabs who have embarrassingly been flipped over onto their shells will have no choice but to submit to the pot.

You are a crab. Aiming to be the best around, you embark on a world tour to flip as many crabs as possible.

name: Enter the Room
description: Sin descripción

name: Car Driving School Simulator
description: Car Driving School Simulator is one of the most realistic car games available! In this feature-packed game you will test your skills driving awesome cars and learn useful traffic rules along the way!

name: Mascot Dunks
description: Dribble, jump and score! Put on your favorite mascot uniform and make some craziest dunks the world has ever seen! We’ve got Whirling Dunks, Boxing Dunks, Face-Palm Dunks, heck - even Superman Dunks! If you dream all nights about dunks then hop on, dress up as Pitbull and show everyone how to do AirWalk Dunk like a King! Not a dog type-of-person? No problem - we’ve got Cats, Lions, we’ve got Astronauts and Bears. We’ve got Diablo if you’re into that kinda things and we’ve got Zombie if last night was a bit too much for you!

name: Swords 'n Magic and Stuff
description:
Swords ‘n Magic and Stuff is a casual, co-op rpg about, you guessed it, swords, magic and other stuff. Adventure with your friends in a cute but perilous world full of action and adventure. Your role is defined by the items you carry and the way you play.

Full online co-op with up to 8 players means that you can play with all your friends! Get lost in the vast world of Tirawyn and become who you want to be.

name: Bingo for Nintendo Switch
description: Bingo anywhere, anytime! Bingo for Nintendo Switch!

name: Heli Attack 3
description: Heli Attack 3 is the third game in the Heli Attack series. The player has to shoot down the helicopters that try to kill him. Unlike the two previous games in the series, there are multiple levels across a campaign instead of just a high score mode.

name: Heli Attack 2
description: Helicopters come at you in waves, your mission is to take as many choppers down as possible. Pick up weapons and upgrades being dropped by your allies.

name: Heli Attack
description:
You are under attack from above and must survive using only your trusty machine gun. Destroy as many enemy helicopters as you can. The goal is to see how many points you can obtain.

Heli Attack 1 by Squarecircleco is the first game of the Heli Attack series. It is much simpler than its successors, featuring a single screen in which the player character accrues points by shooting an indestructible helicopter until the player runs out of health. With the exception of the Squarecircleco's sound logo which plays before the title screen, the game featured no sound.

name: Writhe
description: Sin descripción

name: Splitter
description: This physics-based puzzle game challenges you with 25 brain-teasers aimed to develop your spatial thinking and accuracy. Draw a line to cut joints, as well as wooden blocks and planks. Learn to avoid obstacles and use dynamic figures to bring the smiley to the exit. The objective gets challenging as you get fewer moves to solve the puzzle. Collect all the stars and prove a physics games pro. Having become a smash hit among flash games online, this logic game returns to your desktop or mobile browser to play online without download.

name: Splitter 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Tentacle Wars
description: Sin descripción

name: Beatbox Sausages
description: Sin descripción
